summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is recommended to investigate the cause of the failure and optimize the page to improve its load time.
insights: The web performance test results suggest that the pricing and blog pages are optimized and perform well.
The homepage load time can be improved by optimizing the elements that are causing the delay.
The "How It Works" page needs urgent attention to identify and resolve the issues that caused it to fail the web performance test.
It is important to continuously monitor and optimize web performance to ensure a good user experience.
